title: Monday night on TV: 3 new shows to kick off the week
text:
Monday night on TV: 3 new shows to kick off the week

Cape Town – Kick off the week with three brand new shows to watch.

From celebrities battling against each other, to a family of lawyers, to an adults only cartoon – here are our top recommendations for tonight.

Celebrity Game Night

20:00 - E! (DStv 124)

The season premiere of Celebrity Game Night kicks off with Minnie Dlamini-Jones, Chris Jaftha and Joey Rasdien joining Team Ayanda. They will go up against Lorna Maseko, Majozi, and Tracey Lange on Team Jason. Who will be the first team to reign supreme?

Bluff City Law

21:00 - M-Net (DStv 101)

Coming from a famous Memphis family known for taking on injustice, brilliant lawyer Sydney Strait (Caitlin McGee) used to work at her father Elijah's (Jimmy Smits) celebrated law firm until their tumultuous relationship got in the way. After barely speaking to him for years, Sydney is suddenly thrust back into the family fold.

South Park (S23)

Showmax

This season, South Park reaches a huge milestone: the 300th episode! Find out what Kenny, Cartman, Stan, Kyle and all the other colourful characters are up to.
